top.title: Gisèle Pelicot tells BBC: I felt crushed by horror - but I don't feel anger
top.summary: In an extensive interview with Newsnight, the woman at the heart of France's biggest rape trial speaks about betrayal, healing and choosing the right path.

top.title: Police activity under way near Nancy Guthrie's home
top.summary: A search has been carried out in Tuscon, Arizona, close to where the 84-year-old was abducted nearly two weeks ago.

top.title: Can Bangladesh's new leader bring change after election landslide?
top.summary: Tarique Rahman is set to be Bangladesh's next prime minister, 18 months after mass protests ousted its longest-serving leader.

top.title: John Wick game starring Keanu Reeves unveiled at PlayStation showcase
top.summary: It's not the first time the iconic hitman has appeared in games, but Saber's will be the first voiced by Reeves.

top.title: Amazon's Ring ends deal with surveillance firm after backlash
top.summary: A Super Bowl advert had sparked new scrutiny of the smart doorbell company's privacy practices.

top.title: AI coding platform's flaws allow BBC reporter to be hacked
top.summary: Vibe-coding tools - which let people without coding skills create apps using AI - are exploding in popularity.
